extendedIngredients.name: part-skim mozzarella cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-1/2 cups (6 ounces) shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese

recipes.title: Sicilian Meat Roll
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, combine the bread crumbs, eggs, tomato juice, parsley, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over the mixture and mix well.                                                                                            On a pieces of heavy-duty foil, pat meat mixture into a 12-in. x 10-in. rectangle. Place the ham and shredded cheese on loaf to within 1/2 in. of edges. Roll up, jelly-roll style, beginning with the short end and peeling foil away while rolling.                                                                                            Place on a greased baking pan with seam side down; seal ends. Bake, uncovered, at 350째 for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reaches 160째. Top with sliced cheese; bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 8 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Sicilian Meat Roll in  ReminisceJanuary/February 1998, p49                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 slice) equals 375 calories, 23 g fat (11 g saturated fat), 163 mg cholesterol, 580 mg sodium, 5 g carbohydrate, trace fiber, 36 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, combine the bread crumbs, eggs, tomato juice, parsley, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over the mixture and mix well.
On a pieces of heavy-duty foil, pat meat mixture into a 12-in. x 10-in. rectangle.
Place the ham and shredded cheese on loaf to within 1/2 in. of edges.
Roll up, jelly-roll style, beginning with the short end and peeling foil away while rolling.
Place on a greased baking pan with seam side down; seal ends.
Bake, uncovered, at 350째 for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reaches 160째. Top with sliced cheese; bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
